subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Juan Monaco of Argentina beat Jarkko Nieminen of Finland, 6-4, 6-3, to win the Power Horse Cup in Düsseldorf, Germany, for his first title of the year.
snippet: Juan Monaco of Argentina beat Jarkko Nieminen of Finland, 6-4, 6-3, to win the Power Horse Cup in Düsseldorf, Germany, for his first title of the year.
